name: electroweb
effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.
